# google\_tpu\_tensorflow\_versions

Get TensorFlow versions available for a project. For more information see the [official documentation](https://cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/) and [API](https://cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.tensorflowVersions).

## Example Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.google as google
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        google.data_google_tpu_tensorflow_versions.DataGoogleTpuTensorflowVersions(self, "available")
```

## Example Usage: Configure Basic TPU Node with available version

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.google as google
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        data_google_tpu_tensorflow_versions_available =
        google.data_google_tpu_tensorflow_versions.DataGoogleTpuTensorflowVersions(self, "available")
        google.tpu_node.TpuNode(self, "tpu",
            accelerator_type="v3-8",
            cidr_block="10.2.0.0/29",
            name="test-tpu",
            tensorflow_version=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_google_tpu_tensorflow_versions_available.versions, ["0"])),
            zone="us-central1-b"
        )
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `project` - (Optional) The project to list versions for. If it
    is not provided, the provider project is used.

* `zone` - (Optional) The zone to list versions for. If it
    is not provided, the provider zone is used.

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `versions` - The list of TensorFlow versions available for the given project and zone.
